name: rant.in
tag_list: rant, vent, meme, meme-generator, photo-text, text-edit, ranting, venting
overview:
Rant.in is a tool (not that kind of tool) to help you vent.

Think of us as a TV channel set to permanent Snark-O-Vision; a virtual soapbox where you get to stand all day long and let it all out. We’re the ‘Cool Kids’ way to express yourself, if we do say so ourselves. Be funny, opinionated, chaotic, random, witty, or downright discerningâ€”mostly, be you. It’s your voice, might as well Rant it!

Share rants on your social networks to spread the social snark.

Rant when you feel like it; we hope you feel like it a lot. If you’ve got questions, suggestions, or just feel the need to direct a rant our way, hit us up at: rant@rant.in
